result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Olga Ivette Padilla

records.addlTxt:
Olga Ivette Padilla not in court. 
The Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office has cleared the active warrant, provided the next court date to the defendant, and requested the warrant be withdrawn with approval of Deputy Chief Judge Carl Ashley. MCSO advised defendant to appear in Room 221 of the Safety Building, in person, at 1:00 PM on 11-07-2022.

Defendant Olga Ivette Padilla not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further orders that bail is forfeited. Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant. ($500.00 signature bond) LW

Defendant Olga Ivette Padilla not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
The Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office has cleared the active warrant, provided the next court date to the defendant, and requested the warrant be withdrawn with approval of Deputy Chief Judge Carl Ashley. MCSO advised defendant to appear in Room 221 of the Safety Building, in person, at 1:00 PM on 9/19/2022.


  Return on warrant scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court.  Karen Lynch Vespalec appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Scheduling Confernece.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further orders that bail is forfeited.

Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.
Defendant failed to appear. State emailed defense counsel digital discovery and offer. Defense request a status date.
Parties advised Effective July 30, 2022 this case will be reassigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15, Room 623.  Court ordered case adjourned. 
  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Paul S.; Or the address of 2814 E Van Norman Ave St Francis WI  
No Contact Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.

Defendant Olga Ivette Padilla in court with attorney Melissa Jane Fitzsimmons.  Defendant Olga Ivette Padilla in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Olga Ivette Padilla appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial. 
This hearing may be streamed live through DACAST at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
